properties.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 23 at 8:09AM PST until January 23 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Tidal overflow flooding expected. Total tide near 10 to
10.5 ft.

* WHERE...North Oregon Coast.

* WHEN...From 9 AM to 3 PM PST Thursday around high tide.

* IMPACTS...Minor flooding, up to 1 ft above ground level, during
high tides is expected in the low lying areas near bays,
sloughs, and the lower reaches of the coastal rivers. Frasier
Road in Tillamook, OR should experience flooding during high
tide today.
properties.instruction:
A Coastal Flood Advisory means that tidal overflow flooding is
expected. Coastal residents in the warned area should be alert
for rising water, and take appropriate action to protect life and
property.

NWSheadline: COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON
